fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
inter_groups:
Animal Welfare Intergroup 
Sustainable Development Intergroup
eu_initiatives:
IFRA Strives to present balanced and fact based policies relating to chemical/ingredient safety. 
 
These policy positions are generally risk based aiming for appropriate and proportionate legislative frameworks. 
 
IFRA is actively engaged in fostering EU business development by providing a legal framework in which  
the protection of know how is a key element.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

Active participation in debates related to IP.
goals__remit: About us: IFRA is the worldwide trade association representing the interests of “fragrance houses”, creators, innovators and manufacturers of fragrance compositions and fragrance materials to scent namely household and personal care products, as well as fine fragrances marketed by the downstream companies.
